ThingDef.label: bionic beak
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial beak. Hardened with plasteel alloy, and installed with enhanced olfactory and taste sensors, it is better than a biological beak in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic beak
ThingDef.description: A beak prosthesis. Its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to open and close with natural movement. Still, it is inferior to a real beak.
